title: Hate Story 3 Trailer: Zareen Khan-Daisy Shah Steam It Up With Lip Lock Scenes
text:
Posted by: Priyanka Prasad Updated: Friday, October 16, 2015, 16:33 [IST] 
Hate Story 3 trailer has come out and the new sequel has just got much bolder and steamier than it ever was. This erotic thriller stars starring Zareen Khan, Karan Singh Grover, Sharman Joshi and Daisy Shah in lead roles. Both the leading ladies started their film career with Salman Khan who has never done on-screen kissing scenes and in this movie his prodigies have done much more than Salman would ever think about doing.While we are left amazed with the amount of bold scenes in the movie, we are sure Salman will be even more shocked seeing Zarine and Daisy stripping their clothes in every other scene. 
Alia Bhatt Goes Bold, Bares Cleavage On Cosmopolitan Cover The girls are seen lip locking with their co-stars, doing bold scenes donning just a lingerie and of course the passionate love making scenes that the Hate Story franchise has been famous for.Directed by Vishal Pandiya, Hate Story 3 is based on hidden hate and open love. While Karan Singh Grover was seen doing bold stuff in Alone movie starring Bipasha Basu. This will be a first time for Sharman Joshi, Zareena Khan and Daisy Shah.Click on the image below to see the official trailer of the movie.
